name: QuickConvert
description: A youtube to mp3 & file conversion app!

scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json && npm install && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.startDev: rm -rf node_modules/ &&npm install && concurrently "npm run devStart" "cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install && rm -rf build/ && npm run start"
